attributes.action: Reconsider the government's stated intention to defer the MOT until a vehicle's fourth year and then MOT test every two years thereafter.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Reducing the periodicity of the UK MOT to comply with the minimum EC requirement will allow millions of reckless car users to save money by skipping vital servicing of safety and emissions systems, making the roads less safe for all road users, costing them more money in insurance and increasing emissions generally.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Reconsider the government's stated intention to defer the MOT until a vehicle's fourth year and then MOT test every two years thereafter."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11591.asp
